RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the loop: route avoiding checkpoints via FM 2050, U.S. 59, and U.S. 359

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: rural area with limited traffic, mostly used by local residents and workers, where vehicles with out-of-town registrations raised suspicions, frequently used as a smuggling route, described as having no shoulder and being 'real narrow' with 'sharp turns', adjacent to the Border Patrol station parking lot, location of drop-offs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruni: reference point for drop-offs, destination for smuggled aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 16: route for picked up aliens, potential destination or route for smugglers
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: road intersecting with FM 2050, location of Freer checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 359: road intersecting with FM 2050, location of Hebbronville checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: location where border patrol agents inspect vehicles and process individuals, relevant to the events' context
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.route avoiding checkpoints via FM 2050,: alternative route used by smugglers to avoid checkpoints
